email_text:
Dear [Passenger Name],

Thank you for booking your flight with Delta. Below is your itinerary confirmation:

- Flight 1:
   - Departure: Atlanta Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport (ATL)
   - Destination: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX)
   - Date: [Date]
   - Departure Time: [Time]
   - Arrival Time: [Time]
   - Flight Number: DL1234

- Flight 2:
   - Departure: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX)
   - Destination: Seattle-Tacoma International Airport (SEA)
   - Date: [Date]
   - Departure Time: [Time]
   - Arrival Time: [Time]
   - Flight Number: DL5678

To check-in for your flight, please click on the following link: [Check-in Link]

Please make sure to arrive at the airport at least 2 hours before your scheduled departure time. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us at [Delta Customer Service Phone Number].

Thank you for choosing Delta. We look forward to welcoming you on board.

Sincerely,
Delta Airlines
